resources.string: Adjust Dolby Sound settings to experience immersive, multidimensional sound that envelops you, bringing movies, music, and games to life
DTS:X Ultra improves audio quality with three-dimensional spatial effects and a user-adjustable equalizer, allowing for a more engaging entertainment environment
With Sony\'s 360 Reality Audio Upmix (360 Upmix) technology, you can enjoy spatial and immersive sound with regular stereo sources

The 360 Upmix app will always take priority over the other effects you\'ve turned on (either any of the other settings on this screen with 360 Upmix or just 360 Upmix by itself) for the media sound of apps.

While playing audio content with sound enhnacements, the content's information will take precedence over the settings on this screen. High resolution content can also be play properly when sound enhnacements are turned off.



About Spatial Audio
To enable the 360 Reality Audio feature, turn on Spatial Sound.
All settings on this screen support Spatial Audio.
